Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 17 rebounds, and 15 assists.
Seven Nuggets players scored in double figures.
Denver Nuggets outscored the Atlanta Hawks by 17 points in the third quarter.
Peyton Watson finished a lob from Christian Braun with a reverse jam.
Jamal Murray led the bench to open the fourth quarter.
